means: 邻近，毗连( adjoin的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: We waited in an adjoining office.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们在旁边的办公室里等候。

sentence.Network_en: The population overflowed into the adjoining territory.

entry.def: If one room, place, or object adjoins another, they are next to each other.

example.ex: Fields adjoined the garden and there were no neighbours...
We waited in an adjoining office.
example.tran: 我们在旁边的办公室里等候。

means.word_mean: 1. having a common boundary or edge; touching;

sentences.sentence: "Rhode Island has two bordering states; Massachusetts and Conncecticut"
"the side of Germany conterminous with France"
"Utah and the contiguous state of Idaho"

auth_sentence.content: For three months the adjoining apartment was vacant.
auth_sentence.res_content: For three months the adjoining apartment was vacant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For three months the adjoining apartment was vacant.

auth_sentence.content: I told him I'd meet him on our adjoining porches.
auth_sentence.res_content: I told him I'd meet him on our adjoining porches.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I told him I'd meet him on our adjoining porches.

auth_sentence.content: Someone had leased that swampy inlet and its entire adjoining beachfront.
auth_sentence.res_content: Someone had leased that swampy inlet and its entire adjoining beachfront.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Someone had leased that swampy inlet and its entire adjoining beachfront.

stems_affixes.word_buile: adjoin[v.邻接, 毗连]+ing……的→adj.邻接的, 隔壁的
disjoin[v.[使]分开, [使]分离]+t+ed表形容词→分开的
join结合,连接+t→n.接合处,接头;关节adj.联合的,共同的,连接的
join结合,连接+t→n.接合处,接头;关节adj.联合的,共同的,连接的
re反+join结合,连接+der→反过来接→回答
ad再+join结合,连接→再连上→毗连
dis分开+join结合,连接→连接分开
en进入+join结合,连接→进入连接→命令加入

stems_affixes.value_cn: 参加,加入;联合,连接;和……在一起
stems_affixes.word_buile: join结合,连接→v.参加,加入;联合,连接;和……在一起
sub在下面+join结合,连接→在下面接上→增补
